video_prompt: A vibrant flower slowly blooms, its multicolored petals unfurling. The central stamens subtly quiver. Green leaves underneath gently sway. The rocky background shifts and evolves, hinting at varying light conditions.
image_prompt: Vibrant, multicolored dahlia/chrysanthemum, close-up, top-down shot. Petals gradient: yellow/orange to red/hot pink to purple/blue. Dense yellow stamens center. Green leaves beneath. Rough, dark brown rock background with green shoots. Soft, natural light, sharp focus on flower, blurred background.
refined_video_prompt: Petals slowly unfurl, expanding and revealing their vibrant hues as the flower blooms. Its central stamens subtly quiver. Leaves underneath gently undulate and sway. The background dynamically shifts and evolves, with varying light conditions playing across its surface.
